_instructions.description: Copy this file to parameters-dev.json and fill in your values
_instructions.ExistingDLQArn: ARN of your existing Dead Letter Queue (leave empty to create new)
_instructions.CognitoUserPoolArn: From Cognito console (leave empty for no auth)
